document_data.caption: A map of Gontal depicting the River Esmur.
document_data.name: River Esmur
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Esmur''' flowed from the west out of mountains of [[Gontal]] and into the [[Dragon Sea (Abeir)|Dragon Sea]], across the lands of the [[Dusk Ports]].
document_data.History: The River Esmur was known for its rich banks of fishes, eels, and the coveted [[rock crab]]s. The lands surrounding the river, known as the [[Esmur Flats]], were a burgeoning fishing center because of that.
